video_title: Why Writing With A Pen Is Better
transcript:
so writing with a pen I think is
probably better for a couple of reasons
when you write with a pen what is the
rate of writing that you do versus if
you type pen is slower so if pen is
slower what that means is that you must
slow down your thinking in order to
write with a pen whereas with a computer
we're so fast at typing that we can move
closer to the speed of thought so as you
slow things down stuff will sink in a
little bit more because your mind is
literally spending more time on a
particular thought and it gives you a
chance to kind of organize things out so
I think in some ways writing with a pen
is better
